all.title: All Phoenix Core and Connector Steps
all.description: List of all steps for Phoenix, including Core and all official Connectors. Use these steps to automate forensic and e-discovery workflows.

Core.title: All Steps | Core SDK Documentation
Core.description: List of all steps for Core SDK. An SDK for automating e-discovery and forensic workflows. Core is the SCL language grammar and interpreter, and an SDK for building connectors.

Core/And.title: And Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/And.description: Returns true if all terms are true. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayConcat.title: ArrayConcat Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayConcat.description: Concatenates arrays or streams of entities. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayDistinct.title: ArrayDistinct Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayDistinct.description: Removes duplicate elements in an array or entities in an entity stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayElementAtIndex.title: ArrayElementAtIndex Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayElementAtIndex.description: Gets the array element at a particular index. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayFilter.title: ArrayFilter Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayFilter.description: Filter an array or entity stream using a conditional statement. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayFind.title: ArrayFind Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayFind.description: Gets the first index of an element in an array. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayFirst.title: ArrayFirst Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayFirst.description: Gets the first element of an array or entity stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayGroupBy.title: ArrayGroupBy Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayGroupBy.description: Group elements in an array or entities in a stream using a function. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayIsEmpty.title: ArrayIsEmpty Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayIsEmpty.description: Checks if an array is empty.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayLast.title: ArrayLast Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayLast.description: Gets the last element of an array or entity stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayLength.title: ArrayLength Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayLength.description: Counts the elements in an array or entities in an entity stream.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayMap.title: ArrayMap Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayMap.description: Map each element of an array or entity stream to a new value. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayNew.title: ArrayNew Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayNew.description: Represents an ordered collection of objects.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayReverse.title: ArrayReverse Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayReverse.description: Reverse the order of elements in an array. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArraySkip.title: ArraySkip Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArraySkip.description: Skip the first n elements of an array or entity stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArraySort.title: ArraySort Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArraySort.description: Reorder an array or entity stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ArrayTake.title: ArrayTake Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ArrayTake.description: Take the first n elements of an array or entity stream. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/AssertEqual.title: AssertEqual Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/AssertEqual.description: Asserts that two objects are equal. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/AssertError.title: AssertError Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/AssertError.description: Returns success if the ValueIf step returns an error and a failure otherwise.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/AssertTrue.title: AssertTrue Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/AssertTrue.description: Returns an error if the nested step does not return true.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/CharAtIndex.title: CharAtIndex Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/CharAtIndex.description: Gets the letter that appears at a specific index. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/Clone.title: Clone Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/Clone.description: Creates an array by cloning an element.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ConvertSizeUnits.title: ConvertSizeUnits Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ConvertSizeUnits.description: Convert a string representing a data size to  a string representing the same size but with different units.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DateToString.title: DateToString Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/DateToString.description: Converts a date to the specified format, yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss by default. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/Delay.title: Delay Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/Delay.description: Delay for a specified amount of time. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/Divide.title: Divide Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/Divide.description: Divide an integer by a list of integers. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DocumentationCreate.title: DocumentationCreate Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/DocumentationCreate.description: Generates documentation for all available steps.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DoNothing.title: DoNothing Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/DoNothing.description: Does nothing.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DoubleDivide.description: Divide a double by a list of doubles. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DoublePower.description: Raises a double to the power of a list of integers sequentially. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DoubleProduct.title: DoubleProduct Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/DoubleProduct.description: Calculate the product of a list of doubles. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DoubleSubtract.description: Subtract a list of numbers from a number. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/DoubleSum.title: DoubleSum Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/DoubleSum.description: Calculate the sum of a list of doubles. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntityCombine.description: Combine two entities. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntityFlatten.description: Recursively flatten an entity, turning all nested entities into separate fields. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntityFormat.title: EntityFormat Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/EntityFormat.description: Formats an entity or an array of entities as a string. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntityGetProperties.description: Gets the names of all properties of an entity. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntityGetValue.title: EntityGetValue Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/EntityGetValue.description: Gets the value of a property from an entity. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntityMapProperties.description: Rename entity properties.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntitySetValue.description: Returns a copy of the entity with this property set. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/EntityValidateRelations.title: EntityValidateRelations Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/EntityValidateRelations.description: For each entity in the stream, check that the value of the `ParentIdProperty` is the value of the `IdProperty` for at least one entity in the stream.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/Equals.description: Returns true is all terms are equal. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/For.title: For Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/For.description: Do an action for each value of <i> in a range.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/ForEach.title: ForEach Step | Core SDK Documentation
Core/ForEach.description: Do an action for each element in an array. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/GetApplicationVersion.description: Gets the current version of the application. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/GetAutomaticVariable.description: Gets the value of the automatic variable. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

Core/Repeat.description: Repeat a step a set number of times.. Use this step to easily automate forensic and e-discovery workflows using Phoenix.

FileSystem.title: All Steps | File System Connector Documentation
FileSystem.description: List of all steps for File System Connector. Phoenix connector for interacting with file systems of various OSes. Includes steps to interact with files, directories, paths, and compression.

Microsoft365.title: All Steps | Microsoft 365 Connector Documentation
Microsoft365.description: List of all steps for Microsoft 365 Connector. Phoenix connector for Microsoft Graph API. Easily import and export data from Microsoft 365 applications when automating forensic and Land Rover Discovery workflows.
